name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trump Filter with Dog and Cat Pictures

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces articles about Donald Trump with dog or cat photos and corresponding text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of constantly seeing news articles about Donald Trump? The Trump Content Filter Chrome extension replaces any articles containing keywords related to Donald Trump with random, adorable images of cats and dogs. It also swaps out the article text with playful phrases like "meow meow meow" or "woof woof woof." Turn your browsing into a fun and uplifting experience by replacing unwanted content with heartwarming animal photos and cheerful messages.
